DOC.brief_summary: This study compare effect one-month diet high saturate fat ( SF ) , glycemic index ( GI ) , salt ( Na+ ) diet low nutritional parameter memory cognitive function , MRI measure brain structure , function , perfusion , well blood cerebrospinal fluid level amyloid-beta ( Aβ ) , insulin , lipid ( total cholesterol , HDL , LDL , oxidize LDL , triglyceride ) , cytokine , apolipoprotein E ( ApoE ) , apolipoprotein J , cortisol , soluble low density lipoprotein receptor-related protein ( sLRP ) , glucose middle-aged adult ( 45-65 year age ) normal cognition mild cognitive impairment .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects middleaged ( 45 65 year age ) fall continuum healthy ( prehypertension insulin resistance ) prehypertensive insulin resistant ( pHAIR ) . 2 . Subjects recruit base memory status normal memory memory impairment diagnosis mild cognitive impairment ( MCI ) . Those subject MCI assess physician neuropsychologist expert diagnose MCI accord Petersen criterion . 1 . Diabetes control diet exercise ; current previous use diabetes medication 2 . Average systolic blood pressure three occasion < 90 > 139 mm/Hg , diastolic blood pressure < 60 , current use antihypertensive medication ; 3 . Clinically significant elevation liver function test follow : SGOT > 1.5 X ULN , SGPT > 1.5 X ULN , Alkaline Phosphate > 1.5 ULN . 4 . Clinically significant elevation lipid profile follow : LDL > 190 , triglyceride > 340 , total cholesterol > 260 LDL/HDL ratio > 3.0 . 5 . Significant neurologic disease might affect cognition , include AD ( MCI allow ) , stroke , Parkinson 's disease , multiple sclerosis , severe head injury loss consciousness > 30 minute permanent neurologic sequela ; 6 . Significant medical illness organ failure , uncontrolled hypertension cardiovascular disease , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , liver disease , kidney disease ; 7 . Current use antipsychotic , antidepressant , anticonvulsant , anticoagulant , anxiolytic , sedative medication ; 8 . Current use cognitionenhancing medication ; 9 . Current use glucocorticoid ; 10 . Current use cholesterollowering medication , include : 1 . HMGCoA Reductase Inhibitors [ Statins : Atorvastatin ( Lipitor ) , Fluvastatin ( Lescol Lescol EX ) , Lovastatin , Pravastatin ( Pravachol ) , Rosuvastatin ( Crestor ) , Simvastatin ( Zocor ) ] 2 . Bile Acid Resins [ Cholestyramine ( Questran ) , Colestipol , Colesevelam ( Welchol ) ] 3 . Fibric Acids Derivatives [ Fenofibrate ( Tricor ) , Gemfibrozil ] 4 . Combinations [ Amlodipine/Atorvastatin , Niacin/Lovastatin ( Advicor ) , Ezetimibe/Simvastatin ( Vytorin ) ] 5 . Miscellaneous Categories [ Ezetimibe ( Zetia ) , Niacin aka Nicotinic acid ( Niaspan ) 6 . Overthecounter [ Red yeast rice , Niacinamide , Omega 3 fatty acid ( fish flax seed ) , SloNiacin ] 11 . Common allergies/sensitivities follow food product : dairy , wheat , gluten , tree nut peanut , egg , corn , seafood soy . Other food sensitivity assess casebycase basis . 12 . BMI ≤ 18.5 13 . Current weight < 110 pound 14 . Clinically significant iron deficiency : Hemoglobin < 13.5 white male , < 12.2 white female , < 12.5 black male , < 11.5 black female . 15 . If female , menstruation past 12 month hysterectomy current hormone replacement therapy medication . 16 . Major digestive disorder , absorption issue , surgery , include bowel resection , inflammatory bowel disease ( Ulcerative colitis Crohn 's disease ) , irritable bowel syndrome ( IBS ) tendency toward diarrhea
